page.title: 10Living in Birchwood
page.content: {Birchwood Newtown consists of 3 villages,Locking Stumps,Oakwood and Gorse Covert.Most people have moved into Oakwood in the last 4 years.They came because they wanted a cleaner,healthier environment for their children. They like the open spaces,the greenery and the quiet.Most came from urban areas like Greater Manchester and Merseyside but others are ex-Armed Services families. The chief criticisms are roaming dogs,lack of footpaths on the main roads,poor provision for the pre-schoolchild and no swimming pool.The rented houses are spacious,modern and conveniently situated.They have central-heating and large gardens.Many are now buying the houses.The private houses are also well planned.There is a wide choice withprices ranging fromÂ£20000 toÂ£45000
